text: Congress has an obligation to protect our country's natural beauty, embodied in our nation's parks, rivers, and breathtaking landscapes.
author: Dave Reichert

text: I'm a drugstore beauty girl, I love going to the drugstore and buying makeup.
author: Melanie Fiona

text: I think one of the things that language poets are very involved with is getting away from conventional ideas of beauty, because those ideas contain a certain attitude toward women, certain attitudes toward sex, certain attitudes toward race, etc.
author: Diane Wakoski

text: It is art that makes life, makes interest, makes importance and I know of no substitute whatever for the force and beauty of its process.
author: Max Eastman

text: For two thousand years, the Church has guided the development of music, carefully legislating to fuse artistic talent and aesthetic beauty with the demands of the Faith.
author: Richard Morris
